Contact US

The DDPSC Maker Group is excited to announce that we will be hosting a Raspberry Pi Jam, to show off your latest Maker projects. REGISTER HERE. The event is free to the public and will be held on January 31, 2015 at the Danforth Center (St. Louis, MO). If your group is interested in having a booth please contact ddpsc.maker@gmail.com.
